trans-unit.source: Iterates over all following nodes according to the XPath following axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Iterar todos os seguintes nós, de acordo com o XPath seguintes regras de eixo.

trans-unit.source: XPathFollowingMergeIterator iterates over all following nodes according to XPath following axis rules, merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order, and removes duplicates.
trans-unit.target: XPathFollowingMergeIterator iterar todos os seguintes nós, de acordo com XPath seguintes regras de eixo, intercala vários conjuntos de nós seguintes na ordem do documento e remove os duplicados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order and removes duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator>intercala vários conjuntos de nós seguintes na ordem do documento e remove os duplicados.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on name.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"> </xref> classe, que lhe permite filtrar com base no nome de nós.
Devolve o navegador de resultado atual.

trans-unit.source: The Current property changes when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method sets the Current property to the next node and returns <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult>; otherwise, the Current property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade atual é alterada quando o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A>método define a propriedade atual para o próximo nó e devolve <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult>; caso contrário, a propriedade atual permanece inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Moves the iterator to the next following node.
trans-unit.target: Move o iterator para o próximo nó seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"></xref> if there are no more following nodes.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"> </xref> se existirem mais não seguintes nós.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"></xref> if the next input node must be fetched first.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"> </xref> se o nó de entrada seguinte tem de ser obtido pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current*> property was set to the next node while iterating through the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult"> </xref> se o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current*>propriedade foi definida para o próximo nó ao repetir os nós.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current*>
